mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (bno, pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{bno}, #{pcno}, #{comment}, #{commenter}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT cno, bno, ifnull(pcno,cno) as pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY pcno ASC, cno ASC
SELECT cno, bno, pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date FROM comment WHERE cno = #{cno}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE cno = #{cno} AND commenter = #{commenter}
